parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the resource. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource. For example, if you set ResourceType to instance, you must set this parameter to the ID of the related instance.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   instance
*   disk
*   snapshot
*   image
*   securitygroup
*   volume
*   eni
*   ddh
*   keypair
*   launchtemplate
*   reservedinstance
*   snapshotpolicy

All values must be in lowercase.
